LOCATION

The Londoner Hotel
50 Whitcomb St., London WC2H 7DY

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://www.google.com/maps/place/50+Whitcomb+St.,+London+WC2H+7DY/@51.5095796,-0.1319532,18z/data=!4m6!3m5!1s0x487604d1f5632511:0xd5739b2b35f2098e!8m2!3d51.5095796!4d-0.1306657!16s%2Fg%2F11b8vd86d7?entry=ttu” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”Get Directions” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” button_border_color=”#E2A656″ button_icon_color=”#ec157b” custom_padding=”||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” button_bg_color__hover=”#E2A656″ button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” button_border_color__hover=”#E2A656″ button_icon_color__hover=”#FFFFFF”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

TIMINGS

18:30  Drinks Reception
19:30  Dinner Service
21:00  Ceremony
22:45  After Party
01:00  Carriages

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

TICKETS

Entry is by guestlist on the door – there will be no physical tickets.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

DRESSCODE

Black Tie & Formal Wear

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#111111″ custom_padding=”100px||||false|false” top_divider_style=”arrow” top_divider_color=”#1B2E4E” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_font=”|800|||||||” header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_3_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

MENU

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_text_color=”#222222″ header_3_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

STARTER

Rosemary-grilled chicken tikka with tzatziki

Spiced miso aubergine Niçoise salad with orange soy dressing (V)

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_text_color=”#222222″ header_3_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

MAIN

Oven-baked salmon, pearl barley and organic lemon risotto with oven-roasted baby fennel

Gnocchi with cherry tomato, garlic and Parmesan (V)

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_text_color=”#222222″ header_3_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

DESSERT

Milk chocolate and almond mousse with crispy praline, miniature brownie and espresso reduction

Alcohol-free beverage alternatives available upon request

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding_tablet=”120px||0px||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”120px||0px||false|false” top_divider_style=”arrow” top_divider_color=”#111111″ bottom_divider_style=”arrow2″ animation_intensity_slide=”10%” animation_speed_curve=”ease-out” transform_styles_tablet=”” transform_styles_phone=”” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#222222″ header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#222222″ header_2_text_align=”left” header_2_text_color=”#222222″ header_2_font_size=”41px” header_3_text_align=”left” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||11px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” header_2_text_align_tablet=”center” header_2_text_align_phone=”center” header_2_text_align_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_font_size_tablet=”41px” header_2_font_size_phone=”36px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_3_text_align_tablet=”center” header_3_text_align_phone=”center” header_3_text_align_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

INTRODUCING YOUR HOST

SEANN WALSH

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#222222″ header_2_text_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_margin=”||8em||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”||2em||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”||2em||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Fresh from the jungle on I’m A Celebrity Get Me Out Of Here and described as “the best observational comedian of his generation” (The Guardian), this Edinburgh Award nominee’s last UK tour show ‘After This One, I’m Going Home’ ended with standing ovations around the country.

Seann has starred in Live At The Apollo, Tonight at The London Palladium, Celebrity Juice, The Stand Up Sketch Show, Virtually Famous, 8 Out of 10 Cats, Chatty Man and Stand Up Central. 2022 also saw Seann release his latest stand-up special Kiss free to watch on Youtube.

Seann can also be heard on his regular podcast What’s Upset You Now, alongside co-host Paul McCaffrey, which sees them both moan for exactly 15 minutes about the things that infuriate everyone.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#1B2E4E” custom_padding=”2.5em||150px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

QUESTIONS?

If you need more information about the night, or your booking, get in touch with our events team:

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”mailto:events@performancein.com” button_text=”Drop Us an Email” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” button_border_color=”#E2A656″ button_icon_color=”#ec157b” custom_padding=”||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” button_bg_color__hover=”#E2A656″ button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” button_border_color__hover=”#E2A656″ button_icon_color__hover=”#FFFFFF” button_bg_enable_color__hover=”on”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
